TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Build Bear buildings and units faster in this city.
TEXT.French: Construit les bâtiments et unités Ours plus vite dans cette Ville.

TEXT.English: Instead of only being able to train Bear units in the city you built the wonder in this building allows them to be built in any of your cities. It can only be built in the ciy with the Bear Trainer World Wonder.
Allows the training of bear units in all cities. Requires Bear Trainer Wonder.

There is no evidence bears were ever trained for warfare. The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bear Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] building is part of the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]alternate timeline technologies[COLOR_REVERT]. Technologies that might have been.
TEXT.Italian: Non ci sono prove che gli orsi furono mai usati in guerra. L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Allevatore di orsi[COLOR_REVERT] è un edificio parte delle [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Tecnologie alternative[COLOR_REVERT]. Tecnologie che potrebbero essere esistite.

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bear Trainer[COLOR_REVERT] is required to train [LINK=UNIT_BEARRIDER]Bear Riders[\LINK].
TEXT.Italian: L'[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Allevatore di rosi[COLOR_REVERT] è necessario per addestrare [LINK=UNIT_BEARRIDER]Cavalcatori di orsi[\LINK].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bear Riders[COLOR_REVERT] are early-game mounted units. This particular rider is using [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Bears[COLOR_REVERT] instead [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT] and is slower than the rest of the Riders.
